name: Shield of Surging Flame
description:
The character to which this is attached is immune to all DMG.
This status will provide 2 instances of Pyro Application (Can be depleted using Elemental Reactions): Once the instances are depleted, this effect will be removed, and the character to which this is attached will be unable to use Skills and take 6 Piercing DMG at the End Phase.
descriptionraw: The character to which this is attached is <color=#FFFFFFFF>immune to all DMG</color>.\nThis status will provide 2 instances of <color=#FF9999FF>Pyro Application</color> (Can be depleted using Elemental Reactions): Once the instances are depleted, this effect will be removed, and the character to which this is attached will be <color=#FFFFFFFF>unable to use Skills</color> and take 6 $[K5] at the End Phase.
